Text: In order to bring down a powerful drug ring operating within the underground street-racing circuit, a cop takes on a new identity and goes undercover. After mixing with the racers, he learns that the head of the operation knows that there is a rat in his midst-resulting in plenty of high-octane action and excitement. Tristan Ott, Trey Alley, Tom Breedlove star. 98 min. Soundtrack: English Dolby Digital 5.1; audio commentary; radio interview; theatrical trailers.
